text.bold: European Parliamentary Election - Wales / Etholiad Seneddol Ewropeaidd - Cymru Thursday 22 May, 2014 / Dydd Iau 22 Mai, 2014 Statement of Parties Nominated and Notice of Poll / Datganiad o'r Pleidiau a Enwebwyd a Rhybudd o Etholiad

block.text: 1. The following registered parties have been and stand nominated: 1. Mae'r pleidiau gwleidyddol canlynol wedi eu henwebu:

Britain First
Remember Lee Rigby
British National Party Because we can make Wales better
Conservative Party Ceidwadwyr Cymreig / Welsh Conservatives

NO2EU
Yes to Workers' Rights / Ie i Hawliau'r Gweithwyr
Plaid Cymru - The Party of Wales Plaid Cymru - Cymru'n Gyntaf / Plaid Cymru - Wales First

text.bold: Socialist Labour Party / Plaid Lafur Sosialaidd

2. A Poll will be taken on Thursday, 22 May, 2014 between the hours of 7.00am - 10.00pm 2. Cynhelir y Bleidlais Ddydd Iau, 22 Mai, 2014 rhwng 7.00yb - 10.00yh. BRYN PARRY-JONES 24 April, 2014 Regional Returning Officer for Wales / Swyddog Canlyniadau Rhanbarthol dros Gymru 24 Ebrill, 2014 County Hall, Haverfordwest, Pembrokeshire SA61 1TP / Neuadd y Sir, Hwlffordd, Sir Benfro SA61 1TP Printed and published by the Regional Returning Officer / Argraffwyd a chyhoeddwyd gan y Swyddog Canlyniadau Rhanbarthol EU2
